name: Plenty PLY
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Plenty is a decentralized exchange on Tezos that offers a seamless trading experience. Users can trade, earn, govern and build on the platform. Plenty features both stable and volatile liquidity pools, enables near-zero slippage trades and easy bridging from Ethereum and Polygon.
